title: John Dyer Baizley from Baroness
itunes:title: John Dyer Baizley from Baroness
description:
Happy 7th anniversary to the show! We keep chugging along and this week is a special discussion with John Dyer Baizley from Baroness. I have loved the band for quite some time and finally had a chance to bring John on, and he did not disappoint. We get in deep with DIY culture, love of the process and defying boundaries. It's a reflective look on a very creative mind. Get 20% off your order from DripDrop, the incredible tasting drink mix to battle dehydration by using the code WORDS20. Visit Sonos to check out their incredible line of speakers to outfit your home in superior sound. Try Petreleaf, CBD products from Colorado to help your pet along with a variety of ailments. Get 10% off by using the code WORDS at checkout. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
